title: Aluminium Cover For EF300 Lock Range
body:
This aluminium cover is designed to conceal the electromagnetic lock with its bracket when the door is closed.

It is a cover for EF300 lock series with EF300L and EF300/550Z brackets.

title: Aluminium Cover For EF550 Lock Range
body:
This aluminium cover is designed to conceal the electromagnetic lock with its bracket when the door is closed.

It is a cover for EF550 lock series with EF500L and EF300/550Z brackets.
